channel.title: Labs on Classroom
channel.description: Recent content in Labs on Classroom

item.title: DVWA Docker Setup
item.description: Damn Vulnerable Web Application Docker container Damn Vulnerable Web Application (DVWA) is a PHP/MySQL web application that is damn vulnerable. Its main goal is to be an aid for security professionals to test their skills and tools in a legal environment, help web developers better understand the processes of securing web applications and to aid both students & teachers to learn about web application security in a controlled class room environment.

item.title: Vulnerable Apps, Servers, and Websites!
item.description: overview The following is a collection of vulnerable servers (VMs) or websites that you can use to practice your skills (sorted alphabetically). Learning Platforms and VMs VulnHub Hack the Box TryHackMe eLearn Security PentesterLab bWAPP CloudGoat Damn Small Vulnerable Web Damn Vulnerable ARM Router (DVAR) Damn Vulnerable iOS Application (DVIA) Damn Vulnerable Web App (DVWA) Damn Vulnerable Web Services Damn Vulnerable WordPress DOMXSS Extreme Vulnerable Node Application(XVNA) Game of Hacks Gruyere Hack This Site Hack This Hack Yourself first Hackazon HellBound Hackers Kubernetes Goat Metasploitable2 Metasploitable3 Over The Wire Wargames OWASP Juice Shop OWASP Mutillidae II Peruggia PortSwigger Web Security Academy RootMe Samurai Web Testing Framework Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerable Lab Snyk exploit-workshop Try2Hack Vicnum Vulnerable Single Sign-On (SSO) Web Security Dojo WebGoat XXE Lab WebSploit Labs WebSploit Labs (created and maintained by Omar 立r Santos) Mayhem - vulnerable container created by Omar 立r for Mayhem 2020 RTOV-Hackme - vulnerable container created by Omar 立r for DEF CON 27 RTV-Safemode - vulnerable container created by Omar 立r for DEF CON Safemode
